passives.name: Hyper Jump Extension
passives.desc:
Hyper Jump use +2

When using Hyper Jump:
  Becomes group attack
   PG attack hit count becomes 3; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
  Triggers additional  PF attack on target after use
  Lancer duration +1

When using Boost Jump:
  Becomes group attack
   PG attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
passives.short_desc: Hyper Jump Extension: Boost to Hyper Jump

passives.name: Dragoon Attack Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK? SPD while Dragoon active
passives.short_desc: Dragoon Attack Speed: Raises ATK? SPD

passives.name: Dragon Dive Extension
passives.desc:
Dragon Dive use +1

When using Dragon Dive:
   PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
  Dragoon duration +1

When using Dragon:
  Additional  PN ranged  PG attack before  PF attack
passives.short_desc: Dragon Dive Extension: Boost to Dragon Dive

passive.name: Rocket Soul
passive.desc:
When using Hyper Jump? Boost Jump:
  BRV damage boost

When using Hyper Jump:
  Lancer boost? duration+
passive.short_desc: Rocket Soul: Boost to Hyper Jump

passive.name: Passion for Space

Dragon Dive use +1
Dragon Dive BRV boost? removal of 1 buff from target
Dragoon boost? duration+
Increased HP recovery limit with Dragon
passive.short_desc: Passion for Space: Boost to Dragon Dive
